bill.title: California Holocaust Memorial Week.
bill.description: Relative to California Holocaust Memorial Week.

history.action: Introduced. To print.
From printer.
Referred to Com. on HIGHER ED.
In committee: Hearing cancelled at the request of author.
From committee: Be adopted, and re-refer to Com. on APPR. Re-referred. (Ayes 7. Noes 1.) (May 5).
In committee: Placed on Appropriations suspense file.
In committee: Held under submission.
Re-referred to Com. on RULES. pursuant to Assembly Rule 96.
From committee chair, with author's amendments: Amend, and re-refer to Com. on RULES. Amended.
Re-referred to Com. on RULES.
From committee chair, with author's amendments: Amend, and re-refer to Com. on RULES. Amended.
Re-referred to Com. on RULES.
From committee: Be adopted. To third reading. (Ayes 11. Noes 0.) (February 4).
Amended, adopted, and to Senate. (Page 4714.)
In Senate. To Com. on RLS.
From committee chair, with author's amendments: Amend, and re-refer to committee. Amended and re-referred to Com. on RLS.
Ordered to third reading.
Adopted and to Assembly. (Ayes 36. Noes 0. Page 4825.)
In Assembly. Concurrence in Senate amendments pending.
Senate amendments concurred in. To enrollment. (Page 6717.)
Enrolled and filed with the Secretary of State at 10 a.m.
Chaptered by Secretary of State - Res. Chapter 140, Statutes of 2010.
